subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Brad Bryant shot a four-under-par 68 Sunday in stiff winds and searing 90-degree heat at Whistling Straits to take advantage of another collapse by Tom Watson and win his first senior major.
snippet: Brad Bryant shot a four-under-par 68 Sunday in stiff winds and searing 90-degree heat at Whistling Straits to take advantage of another collapse by Tom Watson and win his first senior major.
